name: Skeler Boy PC NES and GAME BOY
name_original: Skeler Boy PC NES and GAME BOY
description:
Full game on November 20, 2021 // Demo available below :) Skeler Boy

Is a psychological horror adventure, FOR PC.

Inspired by movies from the 70s and 80s, The Exorcist, Terminator, The Neverending Story, Inside the Labyrinth, the Shining etc.

Open world, 2D, 2.5D and 3D Anaglyph!

Puzzles, objects, scares and many more things! Kickstarter campaign, Will you help me?

https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/skelerboy/skeler-boy-part-ii-for-game-boy-cartridge-and-pc

Amazing 3D sound. and more than 10 movie soundtracks.

The only pixel art game, in 3d anaglyph!

If you have red and blue glasses, use them with this image!

Inspired by Metal Gear Solid, Zelda, Silent hill...

Lockpicks, Key tests, gametime.

Nes and Game boy.More information in the kickstarter campaign.https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/skelerboy/skeler-boy-part-ii-for-game-boy-cartridge-and-pc


Controls:
  • Move: W,A,S,D
  • Interact: Z,Enter
  • Run: Shift
  • Menu: Escape, x

MANGA.

ASDEREL MAP.


https://megacatstudios.com/blogs/gaming-news/pixel-art-round-up-with-alex-sy

https://www.devuego.es/blog/2021/03/29/skeller-boy-kickstarter-devuego/

https://www.navigames.es/noticias/skeler-boy-un-videojuego-pixel-art-en-2d-2-5d-...
